    NASAControl
    The class NASAControl allows to store input Input and output (a string of final coordinates Position and direction Direction for each Rover, computed from the input) for the navigation of rovers.
    NASAControlTest  
    Position
    The class Position defines a 2D spatial location with coordinates x and y belonging to the set of integers.
    PositionTest  
    Rover
    This class provides a definition of a rover as a position Position and a direction (Direction).
